Subject: Look Up, Look Down, Bye
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Ramhorn:



Ramhorn layed down on the ground near the Ark's CR chambers.  He had been 
there a while, crying and beating the floor.  He suddenly heard a loud crack, 
and opened his optic sensors.  Rolling to his back, he looked up.  He saw a 
jagged piece of metal fall, as did the rest of the cieling.  The metal 
plunged into Ramhorn's chest, the Maximal pinned under over two tons of 
metal, screaming.  He closed his optics as more metal fell, his world now 
black and a total void.
